thread.title: BRIEF-Tivity Health Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.41 From Continuing Operations

title: BRIEF-Tivity Health Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.41 From Continuing Operations
text: 17 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Tivity Health Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.41 From Continuing Operations Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Tivity Health Inc: * TIVITY HEALTH REPORTS FOURTH-QUARTER 2017 DILUTED EPS OF $0.20 AND ADJUSTED DILUTED EPS OF $0.41 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.41 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.20 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 11.5 PERCENT TO $139.4 MILLION * SEES 2018 REVENUES IN A RANGE OF $607 MILLION TO $625 MILLION * SEES 2018 EARNINGS PER DILUTED SHARE IN A RANGE OF $2.12 TO $2.20 * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.76, REVENUE VIEW $616.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
